remarks: Restricted quantification over the union of a set and a singleton, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Nov-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ralunsn.1 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ralunsn $p |- ( B e. C -> ( A. x e. ( A u. { B } ) ph <-> ( A. x e. A ph /\ ps ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
